access_token.Description: An OAuth2 token used for GCP authentication

bucket.Description: The name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket

encryption_key.Description: A 32 byte base64 encoded 'customer supplied encryption key' used to encrypt all state.

impersonate_service_account.Description: The service account to impersonate for all Google API Calls

impersonate_service_account_delegates.Description: The delegation chain for the impersonated service account

path.Description: Path of the default state file

prefix.Description: The directory where state files will be saved inside the bucket

project.Removed: Please remove this attribute. It is not used since the backend no longer creates the bucket if it does not yet exist.

region.Description: Region / location in which to create the bucket
region.Removed: Please remove this attribute. It is not used since the backend no longer creates the bucket if it does not yet exist.
